title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility       Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area is committed to providing inspiring experiences to people of all abilities. Whether you are attending an interpretive program, exploring the exhibits at the visitor center, or having an adventure on one of our trails, we strive to make this special place as accessible as possible.  We are currently updating our accessibility guide; in the meantime, please call (805-370-2301) or email us to assist with your trip planning and visit.    Visit the national page on accessibility for more information.
